Description.text: 16 minute audio tape, created by WKCR personnel and narrated by Robert Siegel, '69C, was presented at an event in the fall of 1968 called "KCA Night". This event was an opportunity for campus groups to present a short skit or presentation to the incoming freshmen in order to convince the new students to join their activities.

RightsHolder.text: This audio may not be reproduced without the permission of Bob Papper. Please contact the University Archives for further information.
